English: Two teams separated by a net bounce a ball back and forth between each other.
Sanskrit: जालेन पृथक्कृतयोः उभयोः सतोः कन्दुकं परस्परं पुरतः पृष्ठतः दले अभ्युत्प्लवतः।

English: The ball is not allowed to touch the floor.
Once it is in the air...
...a team has no more than 3 touches...
Sanskrit: ...त्रिभ्यः अधिकवारं स्पर्शस्य अधिकारं कस्मैचन दलाय न...

English: ...and take the ball from receive to attack...
A wall looms in front of me.
What's the view like over that wall?
It's something I could never, ever see on my own.
Sanskrit: स्वयं द्रष्टुं कदापि न शक्तवान् अहम्
